content.detailedDescription: I was outside on front porch, i heard a deep hum but didn't notice any sound until i saw an object move in the sky. i thought it was a dark plane but i saw no blinking lights. it seemed to have several round shapes on bottom which could have been for lights or it reflected from city lights (not sure because it looked lighter then the object but dark enough you didn't notice. it moved very fast south and disappeared from my view. i still heard a deep hum for maybe two seconds after it disappeared.
content.summary: Black object moved south had light brown on bottom or light reflection. deep hum graceful movement

content.detailedDescription:
=====ufo=== an other things happen 

september 4th 16 
just laying in hotub at 1245am till  all sudden see this bright moving no idea what i was looking at 

then i was keeping a eye on it till it stopped then at 1 it shoots a cross the sky an vanished 
it was nne of lynnwood wa then went south e

 what was really odd was it was very cloudy all nite then ten mins before it happened the sky started getting clear then saw it then it stopped then turn an bolted 

it had a long tail streak as well 


before that happened i started hearing whistling sounds coming from four diff areas near by my house very interesting nite 

last time i heard that i saw something really tall creature watching me listing to them .
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Clear nite then saw a ufo

content.detailedDescription: Two equal lights flying slow for 1 minute from the northwest in a straight line one after the other about 500 feet apart. stopped hovered for 5 seconds and then two lights ascended apart. after that the second second light (bottom) formed into the first one (top) into one light and then shoot straight up. the light dimmed due to increased distance till gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Twe equal lights flying slow in a straight line and stopped fast ascension straight up. two lights dimmed due to increased distance till gone.

content.detailedDescription: i was playing music with my band on sunday evening at the date noted above at smoky oak taproom off of camp road on james island, sc.  i have played the same venue for over two years now with the same vantage point of the skyline over james island south carolina.  there is a clear view of the sky looking directly northeast of the stage set that we play on.  on this particular day it was mostly clear with a few white fluffy clouds  here and there.  usually when i am playing my instrument i look up at the sky and see the sunset or the clouds or whatever is going on in the sky.   i live close to an air force base and close to a regional airport so there are a lot of planes and helicopters that normally fly over, which i'm used to seing  on a regular basis.  the sky was exceptionally blue, and the clouds that there were, which were very few, we're very bright white from the reflection of the sun.  during the middle of one of our songs i looked up and saw a small dark colored orb hovering and slowly assending vertically into the sky.  at first it looked as if it were a child's balloon that was accidentally let loose and was just slowly climbing from the helium,  so i looked away.  once i returned my site back to the skies i noticed that the object was still there but had stopped abruptly.  honestly i couldn't tell how far it was away from me considering the distance of the clouds that were in my sight, however my intuition tells me that it was many many miles away, maybe 10,000 to 15,000 feet above sea level.  once i focused on it again, it appeared to flicker from a dark color to a light color as if the reflection from the sun was creating some kind of optical illusion.  i attempted to signal my other two band members at the time but they were very enthralled with the music and i did not want to interrupt the song.  i did however notice a few other children in the audience and maybe an adult or two also gazing at the sky and pointing.  after about two to maybe three minutes i noticed the object change directions sharply towards the east to maybe about a couple hundred feet in relative distance.  after that i totally lost sight of it as it seem to have vanished in mid air.  i have seen many airborne vehicles and have done a lot of piloting myself as a freelance pilot and i have never witnessed an object of this nature.  unfortunately my bandmates did not witness the same thing but were interested after i told them what i saw.  i am very skeptical of unidentified objects in the sky but for some reason this one caught my attention and persuaded me to report it to the only source that i know that would take it seriously.  i wish i had a better description or video evidence but unfortunately my story is all that i have and i hope it has some kind of rrvelance to your cause.  my feelings were, "am i actually seeing a ufo or is this just something floating around that i can't describe?"  to me it was not something that you would normally see in the skies but something that is abnormal.  it was definitely not a balloon or anything that i have ever witnessed before.
content.summary: What looked like a balloon being let go and hovering into the sky just beyond a small group of clouds suddenly stopped, changed directions rapidly, then disappeared. the reflection of light periodically changed from black to a silverish white. hard to see

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving and i thought i saw a large bird but it was larger and black and was  like a helicopter but more smooth moving. it was over fort detrick then i noticed a shiny disk moving in a slow hovering way. it definitely wasn't a normal plane pr helicopter. so i pulled over on a side street to watch it. it was moving slowly above the tree tops. then. it was really high up and looked like a star. only it was 2 pm. it was staying in the same place and i had things to do, so i left.

i tried filming it but couldn't really see it on the camera. my eyesights not too good. but it's does pass through real quick in one of my videos.


i didn't feel anything in particular. calm enough. curious. i thought it might be a drone or some government vehicles.

i  can't upload my film right now, but if you have an email where i can send it. i'll do that.
content.summary: I thought i saw a large bird but it was larger and black amnd was  like a helicopter but more smooth moving. was over fort detrick then i noticed a shiny disk moving in a slow hovering way.After i pulled over it was really high up in the same spot

content.detailedDescription: While stargazing, i witnessed a stationary v shaped set of pink lights with 6-8 lights per side, far off in the distance. it disappeared after 3 seconds.
content.summary: V shaped set of pink lights with 6-8 lights per side

content.detailedDescription: Former aircrew (communications), i have been observing since 1994, flight paths, maneuvers, various altitudes, brightness, etc., and now i am trying to communicate with them. this area is big with celebrations, new years, 4th of july, etc. and for the last 3 celebrations i have seen a pattern (i am not the only witness, but will or has anyone come forward, ??). i think they are attracted to the frequency of the bottle rockets, or within the harmonics of the whistle during launch. 2015 july 4th, 2016 new years, and 2016 july 4th, multiple craft appeared observing the celebrations, others in town in various locations had to witness, they were that obvious. the main color of lights they display is red, but it also looks orange, yellow, white all mixed together.  over the last couple of months i have confirmed, in my belief, i have communicated with craft with flashing light from me, led works best, sending prime numbers, maximum, 1-13, and about 90% of the time, acknowledgement from the craft, with a single flash/pulse of light has been observed.
content.summary: I flashed with led light, prime #'s 1-11, it responded with 1 flash back.

content.detailedDescription:
Every night when i'm out drinking coffee with my grandmother and mother the star like object appears and is constantly blinking with bright lights..And appears to move in an awkward position bouncing in a 20 ft. up down side to side formation...I finally decided to take video with a hand held cam cord..Where you can see the object moving in that flight pattern as well as seeing red lights luminous from object. i am a firm believer that there is things in this world that we can't comprehend or explain..I am a 22 year retired vet..And i know nothing in our military that moves or hover like the object is have been seeing..The objective is still here i decided
to report it because it is something i have never in my life have seen before..I have the original footage but will not load it up to ensure its authenticity..I am actually afraid that i have it but hopefully you all understand my concern is can assure you i have actually footage and would willing relinquish in person to the appropriate authorities..Thank you.
content.summary: Appears every night around 8pm until 1130pm for the last 3 weeks

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At 8:53 pm on september 5th, 2016 my wife and i observed 3 lights in the sky to the east of us, driving southbound on rt.222, near the ephrata exit. we quickly passed them by but as we watched them they seemed to rearrange their formation but consistently kept a triangular formation between them. i've seen things before in the sky that i thought might be unidentified but these lights were impactful enough to make me report.
content.summary: Saw 3 lights in sky in a formation that changed driving south on rt. 222

content.detailedDescription: I was doing atv with two other people during night time (it was 8 pm and it was dark ouutside) and i looked at the sky to see the stars and that's when i saw a orange object in the sky, i stop the atv and looked at it for about a minute asking myself what it could be but i did not find any answer to what it could be (it could not be an airplane or helicopter,etc because the object did not move and did not make any sound. it could not be a star because it was to low for it to be a star (it was not in space) and it could not be a light that someone had puted there because it was to high. could it be a satalite? no because it was realy to low, could it be a boat? no beacause the object was in the sky, could it be a street light? no because the object was over a lake, could it be a tower,etc? no because the object was over a lake.... me and two other people could not find any answer of what it could of had been) i went away with my atv and when i came back (about 40 seconds later) at the same place that i saw it the object was gone, i looked every where around in the sky and i did not see the object anymore.....
content.summary: The ufo was or made a light that looked similar to the sun (event occured during night time)(i just want to let you know that i don't speak english, it is someone that i know that wroted this for me in english and i don't have any phone number)

content.detailedDescription: Family was out driving around looking for moose. stopped to get out of car for a smoke.  i looked up at big dipper and at the last star on the handle i watched what looked like another star appear out from behind and fly to the middle star of orion's belt and disappear. not sure what it was but know it was in space so no plane. i know it wasn't a shooting star or comet or métier because seen hundreds of them and know the look.  i figure hss to be ufo.
content.summary: Watched it move from 1 star to another

content.detailedDescription:
It was during the summer of 2006 that i was watching the seagulls and their young flapping about when i noticed an orange orb/object very high up in the sky. ten seconds later another orange orb/object appeared behind the first one. they both moved at the same speed, like they were observing/mapping etc-etc (albeit ten seconds apart). i watched them both head in a south-east direction until they vanished from sight.

they were not planes, they seemed too high up.  they were certainly not those chinese lanterns that is for sure. 

i have no idea as to what they were that night back in 2006. i am sure there is a rational explanation ?.
content.summary: Two orange like rbs

content.detailedDescription: For the past week i have been observing  objects regularly  flying over wigan these ufo s  have been flying across flight paths of commercial  planes stopping then changing directions i have observed  numerous ufos across the sky now i no what  commercial airline and military planes fly and look like and no what im seeing why is the goverment or indeed no one else seem to be concerned i am of sound mind and no what im seeing what is going on these ufos are round in shape some very bright others not and im seeing thes in numbers sorry i have no footaage to show but would like somebody to take a look at these as they seem to be regular occurrence  yes i am a firm beliver and just wonder what the hell is going on over wigan. lancashire uk thanks
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have been observing  nightly ufo s hovering  changing directions  for the past week

content.detailedDescription: I was in manchester town centre with my partner as we was walking i seen this bright light in the sky ahead of me i said to my partner look at that there was no flashing lights to say it was an airplane or a helicopter i watched it move from right to left i got my phone out and took two picture the shape was a basketball then when i zoom in on the picture on my phone the shape change from a basketball to an egg shape and there was lights inside the shape this could not be anything but a ufo
content.summary: It was bright silver egg shape going from right to left if it was an air plane i would of heard a noise

content.detailedDescription:
9/2/16 while driving northbound on interstate 5, in central california near crows landing at approximately 04:40, i saw, and filmed with my dash camera, a large object enter our atmosphere. it came in to the north of my location and was seen headed east as it descended in a slight arc.  it looked like a long cylinder or tube. as it descended and gave off brilliant colors as the leading surface burned. 
it was difficult to judge the actual size and distance, but i would guess it was 43 to 45 miles away. possibly over the auburn, ca area. i though it could be a saucer shape, and that i was looking at it from the side edge.
from the bottom to the top of the object it looked as if it was painting a rainbow of colors as it swept across the sky at about half the speed of a shooting star. see video at 4:46:33.
content.summary: Possible rocket booster/space junk re-entering atmosphere?

content.detailedDescription: I work at cfb borden ontario,where they were having their 100th anniversary  air show on july 11+12. on july 9th i was given permission to go up on the roof of our building to take pictures of the practice runs.I was using a nikon d90 shooting at 4 1/2 frames per second.The snow birds made a fly by, but i was not able to keep them in frame for more than 3 or 4 shots and then they flew out of frame and the camera took one more shot(remember i was in rapid shoot mode) and then the camera simply shut down.No power at all.I just assumed my batteries had died and left.Upon arriving home i examined the camera and found it was workig fine.I reveiwed the shots i took but what i found on the very last frame before the camera shut down blew my mind.Don't know if this is some kind of camera anomilly but i don't think so. what do you make of this ?
content.summary: July 9 2016 caught this image while taking shots of air show practice runs.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home. my cousin, that lives upstairs,called me to come to her terrace because she and her mother has seen something strange. when i was there, the sky was clear and nothing was there. but, suddenly, a brigh orange globe of light appeared in the sky, such as turning on a light slowly. it was still and motionless.It didn't seem very big and it seemed to be high in the sky. then, suddenly,the globe of light  always more accelerated, crossing the sky from east o west, until it disappeared. no noise or sound. then, few seconds later, another globe of light (same shape, same color, same no noise), appeared in the same position where the first one has appeared. and this new globe of light did the same things that the first one has done.
content.summary: Bright orange globes of light.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on september 4 2016 at 10:55pm. i was driving past talbot lake in jasper national park when i noticed a red and white flashing light above the tree line. my first thought was that it was a plane, but quickly realized that it was flying too low to be one. i kept driving then realized that the lights were not moving across the sky, they remained still but continued to flash. i pulled my car over to get a better look. i was stopped for a total of 15 minutes and the lights still did not move across the sky. i turned the vehicle off to listen to see if it was a plane, but there was absolutely no sound. the lights seemed to disappear behind the clouds so i continued to drive home. about two minutes later, i looked out my window and saw the flashing lights again. they seemed to be flashing in a triangle shape. i pulled over and turned the car off again, this time for about 5 minutes. the lights again disappeared behind the clouds and i decided to start driving again. when i started my vehicle for the second time, all of my waring lights on the dashboard lit up. this has never happened in my car before. i am not sure of what i saw was man made or not, i do however know that i did see lights in the sky and that i am not losing my mind!
content.summary: Saw a red and white flashing lights stationary in the sky over talbot lake

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out to my back yard to check the outside temperature and spotted greenish blue dimmed (glowing) spot 30-40 degrees over the horizon. my first thought was a moving galaxy passing near earth going in noticed. then i called my 11 year old son see if he could make out a shape. then i realize it was moving sw and rising. when it was on the sw sky about 50 degrees it look vertical glowing spot in the sky.My son and i observed air traffic going below it without an incident. then it continued trising and travelling se. when it was 80 degrees from us i was able to see multiple flashing lights. i raised my hands in the air and spread them to get an idea how big this was and i was able to spread them to 60 degrees and it was within. wasn't sure it descended at that point or not. it was large and made no noise. i have actual voice of my son trying to record this on his cell phone but no footage. (i tried to capture it moment i saw it but it was too far out and gave it up.)we watched it till it disappeared into se sky over the roof.
then 2 days ago i found out my neighbour and his wife and 2 others also witnessed this at same exact direction and time and the day! he was able to observed with his binoculars.
content.summary: I watched it move slowly without a noise and it was large with multi flashing lights look like a haze or lighted cloud traveling

content.detailedDescription:
See above. 

the planes that were in the area were definitely fighter jets not a commuter plane.
content.summary: Bright oval object that hovered in the air with no movement or sound then completely turned red at once   it changed colors a few times red and blue without moving an inch. then it flew away. it sounded like fighter jets were in the area at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
When we first saw the ufo me and alain b.  were at the location no.1 on the map  (chemin lac canard). the object produced no sound and was the size of a school bus , (orientation north -east 20 degree) .When we noticed its presence we started running for 872' toward my house (315 chemin grand-rang). the object took some altitude went toward location no.2( orientation north- west 330 degree) faster than us. we went into the house alert my mother we looked at the object from the inside and saw it slowly going toward the no.3 location ( orientation  north-west 300 degree). my friend run back to his house  and me and my mother looked at the object until 10:15 pm approximately.

possible explanations:
 aurora g1=kp5 (green)

5 airports are located near my place

1-saint michel 
hydroaerodrom lac kaiagamac
46 39 06 n  73 53 42o
2-aero st michel
46 40 51 n 73 59 37 o
3-joliette
46 02 42 n 73 30 06 o
4- lourde de joliette
46 06 34 n 73 27 10 o
5-saint alphone rodriguez lac cloutier
46 10 36 n 73 39 02 o
content.summary: 1 hovering green glowing oval object, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Metallic boxes joined together silently rolled over our heads at around 500ft. rigid and i would describe them as a mother of pearl affect.
2 adult witnesses and 5 children sighting for roughly 2 minutes and went off in a westerly direction
content.summary: Sequence of metalic boxes joined together rolling about 500 feet above our heads

content.detailedDescription:
Before recall:
driving home early morning @ 1:30 am or so.  going very slowly on mccarran blvd in reno, nv.  car did a 360 on black ice, we were going very slowly, and my friend was learning to drive in ice like this.  we came to a stop in the middle of the 2 lanes (one way had 2 lanes each).  we saw two blue saucer/discs darting around in the sky.  we had no conversation about it but just looked.   i knew/felt they recognized me and it occurred to me they would come. unbelievably, they both darted down and landed very fast in the empty lot beside us where raley's and a shopping center is now.  at the time there was a large depression/hole in the lot. i started to say that i wanted to go over and look but i was much too frightened and shaking.  my state was of complete terror with heavy breathing.  i heard both car doors click closed very quietly.  i noticed the car was neatly parked on the side of the street, instead of in the middle of the lanes.  she just drove me home and we didn't talk about it.  when she dropped me off it was about 4:30 am and i asked if she would be home in time to which she replied yes, her husband was watching the children and when she got home, she would take over for him to go to work.  every time i tried to pay attention to the time, in the days ahead i couldn't think further on it.  this was to the point where i couldn't put it together that i should have been home at 2:00 am -- at the latest, not 4:30 am.  every time i tried to speak to her about the blue discs darting around, she would get mad at me and not speak on it.

after recall:
i was listening everyday, many times a day, to weight loss hypnosis cds.  then, one day, suddenly i had recall of the event.  i had said to my friend that i wanted to go and take a look, but i was much to scared to do it.  one jumped up on the car hood and windshield on my side.  i said, it's too late, they are already here.  i put my head down to not look at it.  telepathically, it kept telling me to look at it, to which i was resisting and saying no, keeping my head down and not looking.  i heard my friend shriek in terror.  there was another one that went over to her side and she saw it out the window.  telepathically, the one on the windshield in front of me told me to calm her.  i took her hand and said i had been through this before and even though it is awful and scary, i could let her know that for sure, we would be ok, no matter what happened.  finally, i succumed to the more and more insistant demands that i look at it.  i did so and it was so terrifying to look at that ugly thing and realize it had intelligence.  it was all gray.  i think it had gray clothing on.  it's face was so ugly with hairs sticking out around the mouth i was in horror. it was a type of typical gray.   it took hold of me, mind-controlled/hypnotised at this point.  the next thing i recalled was it telling me to watch my step as we walked across the uneven, dirt and weed lot.  so, i looked where i stepped.  it was off to my left.  i could hear my friend walking too, to the right.  i looked up to see the ship.  it was the basic shape, i believe it was landed and a light shining from its center, bottom to the ground.  i was wanting to keep track of my friend and protect her.  i was hoping she would go up some stairs into the ship and i could watch her that way.  so, i asked "where are the stairs?"  the one with me was affectionate and amused by my questions and simply said "there are none."  i remember some of the ship.  its interior was made of black metal with holes in it.  there were different colored lights above the doors.  i remember walking on the metal.  i remember what appeared to be a computer room with many grays in white lab coats checking the monitors and digital readouts.

after recall i realized with telecommunication between us that possibly i could contact it telepathically, which i did.  i asked why did you take me.  i asked a couple of more questions.  every answer was "it's none of your business."  this is outrageous.

i am traumatized to this day about what happened.  i can hardly ride in a car as a passenger without flashbacks of complete horror & terror.  i know i have been visited before and probably abducted.  my art changed when i was young to only being able to draw the big black eyed grays.  i didn't know they existed then.  i recall one night where a huge light was outside in my semi-rural home's driveway.  i knew it was them, i was instructed telepathically or induced to lie down.  i went to bed, i was alone.  i remember them entering and pulling on my toe and saying, she's ready.  i must have been in trance again because i didn't move, or think much more about it.

i am afraid i have been brain chipped and i don't know what for.  i have heard a radio communication from inside -- only once.  i was asked "mary turned you in because..." and then they waited for my response (telepathically) or inside my brain, it is hard to describe.

it's ok to use my story as pleased. i am sorry i have no physical proof, indeed, even a fellow abductee who will not speak of it.  i want to help.  you're right, if it is secret, it can't be up to any good.  i was phsycologically damaged against my will.. these are not ok, or good things.
content.summary: Saw it land, both of us were taken, then we were returned and we drove home.

content.detailedDescription: Just sitting outside on my front porch, smoking and drinking a beer when i noticed it. was able to take some video. several miles in the distance i saw a white, maybe yellow spherical orb floating and moving erratically in the distance. no blinking lights characteristic of a plane, doubt it was a helicopter because it was hovering very close to a thunderstorm.
content.summary: Witnessed an orb floating in the distance, several miles away, but very bright, in front of a thunderstorm. hovered then moved, changed directions multiple times before i started filming

content.detailedDescription: My friend shannon witnessed this event in her room in her house. she looked up at the window, and right as she looked, a light blue star-like dot of light appeared out of nowhere and moved left a short distance in a shallow arc path. her window faces the street. at first, she thought that it was a shooting star but realized if couldn't be because no other stars were visible, and it was blue. shannon says she felt somewhat nervous, after the initial suprise went away. the object simply disappeared suddenly as it had appeared. it lasted about one second. no sound was heard.
content.summary: Small, light blue light moved in a slight arc across sky

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i walked to a nearby cemetery which serves as a pokemon go pokeystop. having taken camping chairs, we sat on site for an hour, and observed a bright, pulsing light above the tree line forty-six degrees ne of our position (in the direction of the star capella). 

it traveled diagonally up and to the right for about a minute at a relatively quick pace, then stopped. approximately twenty minutes later it went straight up from the horizon about five degrees before again becoming stationary. ten or fifteen minutes later it moved directly horizontal to the right (east) at the same quick pace, then resumed a stationary position, which it held the duration of the sighting. 

the sighting began around 11:45pm, and ended when we left at 12:30am. 

the brightness/intensity of the object remained consistent though it's color pulsed silver, red, and blue, in no discernible pattern.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating light, approximate size and brightness of a star; moved right, stopped, moved straight up, then remained stationary.

content.detailedDescription: On a recent summer evening i came out on to my porch after 8 pm and looked east and seen a red orbs just before it disappeared,thinking it was possible that it was a chinese lantern i didn't think much about it.About  30 minutes later i came back outside & seen two more headed my way so i grabbed my camera & shot these orbs go over my neibors house.They we're very bright to the naked eye,flare like.It disappeared in the last 10 seconds of the video.The second wave happened about 20 minutes later,wher i seen about5_6 orbs if different colors accent from a cove near my house but these came at me quickly and scared me and i went back into my house.,when i reviewed my videos i realized when i paused the video frame by frame it was a shape shifting pulsating orb that changed many colors.I shot my footage zoomed in at 4.0× so it was good footage & they were close ,about 60 -100 yard's.I have contacted you to help me look at my footage and make sure it's not a chinese lantern and a camera zoom making it look like a ufo.
content.summary: I witnessed about 10 orbs that pulsated different colors of lights & change shapes any thing from a lighting bolt shape to split into 3 orb's stacked.

content.detailedDescription: I have only told one person about this and it took years. something was not right about that day, it' was just coming out of winter and it was still a little cold but the sun was shining and there were big clouds in the sky. i was leaving my house and walking to my truck and i remember thinking what a beautiful day then i heard a noise like a helicopter but not, it's the only thing i can relate it to. then it got really quiet like everything just stopped, i opened my truck door and went to get in and that's when i saw three silver spheres off in the distance going into a cloud. i waited to see them come out the other side but they didn't. i am the type of person when i see something i want to be able to explain what i saw or when something brakes i want to know how to fix it but this i have no answer for. i feel like i am missing something and it's right in front of me but i can't figure out.
content.summary: Went to my truck and heard a buzzing noise i looked up and everything got really quiet and i saw three shinny spheres go into a cloud and never come out.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to my friends house as we were going to have a few drinks and as i cycled there i stopped to put on my lights. there was a plane in the distance which was pretty far away as usual with its flashing lights but closer there were 3 orange ish lights that seemed to continue moving without stopping, also they didnt seem to hold a static triangle formation as if they were 1 object so there must have been multiple. i originally thought it must of been some sort of plane but there were 3 of them all with the same orange light. i wasnt really that bothered at the time because i just wanted to have fun, now i come to think of it somebody near me has seen the same very recently. they/it didnt do much apart from move across the sky then i continued on to my friends house which is how i ended up losing it, i tried looking for it when i got to my friends house as it was not so far away but i couldnt seem to find it.
content.summary: 3 orange lights in a triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were going to outside to get something from the van when i noticed in the sky 3-4 red/red/orange objects coming from the south skyline headed in a northerly direction with 3 more were noticed coming over the houses in the north headed south again moving quite fast we followed with our heads as they seem to disappear.  1 last one came from the north again over the same house and we again stared in awe as we are unaware of what it could have been. they made no noise like planes that usually fly low and the lights didn't blink like those on planes.  we thought it might be meteors but aren't quite sure. they all headed in a straight line and never flickered.  they faded into the night sky like their light was going out.  very weird. anytime i go outside at night i like to look at the stars.
content.summary: The first set were 3-4 orbs were moving north, 3 more came from south headed north then 1 more headed north from south then all faded. red/orange glowing objects. happened within 5 minutes
